Detailed Description

template<typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = k_vector<vector_distance<T>, vector_distance<T> >>
struct kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_leaf

Kd-tree leaf node.

kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_tree::kd_leaf::kd_leaf ( std::istream &  in  )  [inline]

Construct from an input stream.

Build a kd-tree branch node from the data in a binary input stream.

Warning:
A std::runtime_error exception may be thrown in case of error reading the data.
Parameters:
in Input stream.

void kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_tree::kd_leaf::explore ( kd_search_data &  search_data,
C &  candidates 
) const [inline]

Process a leaf node with many buckets on it. Do not use any upper bounds on distance.

Process a leaf node that contains many buckets. Do not use any upper bounds in distance calculation (otherwise best candidates may be skipped).

Parameters:
search_data Auxiliar data structure used for tree traversal and incremental calculations.
candidates STL container-like object holding the current neighbour candidates.

C &  candidates 
) const [inline]

Process a leaf node with many buckets on it. Allows partial distance calculations.

Process a leaf node that contains many buckets without trying to discard them.

Parameters:
search_data Auxiliar data structure used for tree traversal and incremental calculations.
candidates STL container-like object holding the current neighbour candidates.
